attributes.action: recover the costs to the british taxpayer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
to put in place legislation that will enable the costs to the taxpayer caused by the 'do gooder' charities pursuing alleged breaches of human rights to NON BRITISH citizens, to be  fully recovered.
A full review of the charitable status of such organisations that are involved in such circumstances., to be encopassed within the legislation
